corpus.title: What-EN
corpus.description: The What-EN corpus contains professional audio descriptions in English for the short movie "What happens While".

corpus.title: What-ES
corpus.description: The What-ES corpus contains professional audio descriptions in Spanish for the short movie "What happens While".

corpus.title: What-CA
corpus.description: The What-CA corpus contains professional audio descriptions in Catalan for the short movie "What happens While".

corpus.title: ST-ES
corpus.description: The ST-ES corpus contains audio descriptions in Spanish for the short movie "What happens While" made by students.

corpus.title: ST-CA
corpus.description: The ST-CA corpus contains audio descriptions in Catalan for the short movie "What happens While" made by students.
